Card

We've leveraged Bootstrap cards to enhance your card customization capabilities, enabling a diverse range of designs for our cards.

Examples​

Result

Profile Card

Steven Lee

California, United States

Card
import Card from "@/components/Card/Card"

function MyComponent() {
    return (
        <Card 
            title="Profile Card" 
            titleIcon="fa-solid fa-user" 
            icons={[{ icon: "fa fa-cog"}, { icon: "fa fa-angle-down" }]}
            dismissible={true}
        >
            <div className="d-flex flex-column align-items-center justify-content-center">
                <img
                    src={...img}
                    alt="Card image"
                    className="rounded-circle inline-blocks"
                />
                <h2 className={`mt-2`}>Steven Lee</h2>            
            </div>
            <span className="text-center">
                <i className="fa-solid fa-location-dot"></i>{" "}
                California, United States
            </span>
            
            <hr className="w-100 border-0" />
            
            <div className="d-flex gap-2">
                <a
                    href="#"
                    className="text-decoration-none text-secondary"
                >
                    <i className="fa-brands fa-facebook-f"></i>
                </a>
                <a
                    href="#"
                    className="text-decoration-none text-secondary"
                >
                    <i className="fa-brands fa-twitter"></i>
                </a>
                <a
                    href="#"
                    className="text-decoration-none text-secondary"
                >
                    <i className="fa-brands fa-linkedin-in"></i>
                </a>
                <a
                    href="#"
                    className="text-decoration-none text-secondary"
                >
                    <i className="fa-brands fa-pinterest"></i>
                </a>
            </div>
        </Card>
    );
}

export default MyComponent;

Card With Image​

Result

Card Wtih Image Title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Card
import Card from "@/components/Card/Card"

function MyComponent() {
    return (
        <Card
            isHeader={false}
        >
            <img src={...img} alt="" style={{width: "100%"}}  />
            <h2 className="fs-5 mt-3">Card Wtih Image Title</h2>
            <p className="fs-6 mt-2">
                Some quick example text to build on the card
                title and make up the bulk of the card's
                content.
            </p>
        </Card>
    );
}

export default MyComponent;

Props​

NameTypeDefaultDescription
titlestring
titleIconstring
titleBgstring
isHeaderbooleanfalse
headerPositionstringtop
paddingstring16px
bodyBgstring
iconsarray[]
dismissiblebooleanfalse
onClosefunc
